attributes.action: remove the tag from Jack Tweed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Under the circumstances could Jacks tag be removed so that he can spend precious time with his beloved Jade.He has served his sentance and is no threat to anyone.Please have some compassion and let Jade die with dignity with her loved ones by her side

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
